data.title: Virginia Dept. of Elections: Interactive Map
data.text:
Interactive Map

Pursuant to ยง24.2-103.1 (B) of the Code of Virginia, the Department shall maintain and make available on its official website maps showing the current election district and precinct boundaries of each county and city. Geographical boundaries are provided to the Department of Elections by each locality and are as current as possible. If a local board of supervisors has recently enacted a precinct change, please note that it may take a few weeks to be visible. ELECT makes every effort to provide the most up-to-date and accurate information on its website.

Interactive Map of Voting Districts and Precinct Boundaries

Note: directions are below the map.

Using this Map
